## r equivalent

$$
r = \sqrt{\frac{t^2} {(t^2+(N-2)}}
$$
$$
\text{Var}(r) =\frac{(1-r^2)^2}{N-1},
$$


## Zr

$$
Zr = \frac{1}{2} \ln \left( \frac{1+r}{1-r} \right),
$$

$$
\text{Var}(Zr) =\frac{1}{N-3},
$$

## Zr to r

$$
r = \frac{\exp{(2Zr)}-1} {\exp{(2Zr)}+1} ,
$$

## Effective sample size

$$
N_{ep} = \frac{2n_{h}n_{s}} {n_{h} + n_{2s}},
$$

where $n_h$ and $n_s$ are sample size for hosts and symbionts (in our case: `host_tips_linked_corrected` and `symbiont_tips_linked`). When $n_h = n_h = n$, $N_{ep} = n$.
